resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103292</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103292</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209981</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Networked learning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vernetztes Lernen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude gérée en réseau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprendizagem networked</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparare networked</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δικτυωμένη εκμάθηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El aprender networked</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This topic will assist you in developing online communication and Internet learning skills. It is based on the principles of networked learning where individuals establish an online identity and formulate relationships with other people and information to communicate and develop knowledge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Thema unterstützt Sie, wenn es 
Onlinekommunikation und erlernenfähigkeiten des Internets entwickelt.
Es basiert auf den Grundregeln von vernetztem, erlernend, wo 
Einzelpersonen eine Onlineidentität herstellen und Verhältnisse zu 
den Leuten und zu Informationen formulieren, um Wissen mitzuteilen und
zu entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sujet vous aidera en développant la 
transmission en ligne et les qualifications d'étude d'Internet. 
Il est basé sur les principes de géré en réseau apprenant 
où les individus établissent une identité en ligne et formulent des
rapports avec les autres et l'information pour communiquer et 
développer la connaissance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este tópico ajudar-lhe-á em desenvolver uma 
comunicação em linha e habilidades de aprendizagem do Internet. 
É baseado nos princípios de networked aprendendo onde os 
indivíduos estabelecem uma identidade em linha e formulam 
relacionamentos com os povos e a informação para comunicar e 
desenvolver o conhecimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo soggetto li aiuterà nello sviluppare la 
comunicazione in linea e le abilità imparanti del Internet. È 
basato per principii di networked imparando dove gli individui 
stabiliscono un'identità in linea e formulano i rapporti con la gente
e le informazioni per comunicare e sviluppare la conoscenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το θέμα θα σας βοηθήσει στην ανάπτυξη των σε 
απευθείας σύνδεση δεξιοτήτων επικοινωνίας και εκμάθησης 
Διαδικτύου. Είναι βασισμένο στις αρχές της δικτυωμένης 
εκμάθησης όπου τα άτομα καθιερώνουν μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση 
ταυτότητα και διατυπώνουν τις σχέσεις με άλλους ανθρώπους και 
πληροφορίες για να επικοινωνήσουν και να αναπτύξουν τη γνώση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este asunto le asistirá en desarrollar la 
comunicación en línea y habilidades que aprenden del Internet. 
Se basa en los principios de networked aprendiendo dónde los 
individuos establecen una identidad en línea y formulan lazos con la 
gente y la información para comunicar y para desarrollar 
conocimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209981</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103292</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
